title: User Authentication
description: The system shall provide secure user authentication with username and password credentials, supporting session management and automatic timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity.

title: Document Upload
description: The system shall allow users to upload project documents in PDF, MD, TXT, DOC, DOCX, RTF, and CSV formats with a maximum file size of 25MB per file.

title: Requirements Extraction
description: The system shall automatically parse uploaded documents and extract functional and non-functional requirements using AI-powered natural language processing.

title: Test Case Generation
description: The system shall generate test cases from extracted requirements, including positive, negative, and boundary test scenarios with detailed test steps.

title: System Performance
description: The system shall process uploaded documents and generate analysis results within 30 seconds for files up to 10MB in size, maintaining responsiveness under concurrent user load.

title: Accessibility Compliance
description: The system shall comply with WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility standards, ensuring all interactive elements are keyboard navigable and screen reader compatible.
